subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Corey Pavin shot a second straight two-under 69 to take a share of the second-round lead with Bernhard Langer at the Senior British Open in Carnoustie, Scotland.
snippet: Corey Pavin shot a second straight two-under 69 to take a share of the second-round lead with Bernhard Langer at the Senior British Open in Carnoustie, Scotland.
